site_name: Claremont Way Industrial Estate Claremont WayLondonNW2
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 8 (Fuel Tank Capacity) in relation to planning permission reference 20/4901/FUL dated 22/12/2020 relating to Demolition of existing buildings (Unit 1 Claremont Way Industrial Estate; Former Brent Smelting Works, Land and Buildings to the North West Side of Brent Terrace; Edenway Contractors, 119 Brent Terrace; Unit 1, McGoverns Yard, Claremont Industrial Estate; Nightingale Works, Brent Terrace; 115-117 Brent Terrace) and structures to ground floor level and removal of trees and vegetation and associated activities at land within Claremont Way Industrial Estate, Claremont Way, London, NW2
